channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Free outdoor festivals and more fun Sarasota area events this weekend
item.description: Summer is almost over, and there’s plenty to get excited about this weekend in Sarasota — fromfootball seasontoOktoberfest, with local bars hosting Bavarian-style beer bashes, including one of my favorites, Calusa Brewing.

item.title: Sarasota Orchestra debuts season with rare works from famous composers
item.description: Sarasota Orchestra opens its 2025–26 season next month with a program that flips the script on some of classical music’s most famous names.

item.title: HS Roundup Venice volleyball beats Auburn High in Wheatley's return
item.description: A roundup of high school sports contests played the week of Sept. 15-20, 2025, in Manatee and Sarasota counties. If you don't see your results, have your coach email them to htincoming@gmail.com

item.title: High School Football Week 5 Sarasota, Manatee game previews and predictions
item.description: Preview capsules and predictions for high school football games being played by Sarasota and Manatee County teams on Thursday, Sept. 18 and Friday, Sept. 19, 2025

item.title: Petition to boycott ABC, explained. Why people are canceling Disney+
item.description: This week,ABC indefinitely suspended Jimmy Kimmelfrom airing his late-night showin response to harsh criticismfrom the head of the Federal Communications Commission (FCC), which regulates radio, television, wire, satellite and cable services.

item.title: Sarasota lawmaker seeks to extend tax breaks for hurricane victims
item.description: SarasotaCongressman Greg Steubeis pushing to keep disaster tax relief through 2026, with a bid to extend his “Federal Disaster Tax Relief Act.”

item.title: Top 5 concerts this week in Sarasota, Manatee, Charlotte…
item.description: We kick off this week with a Sarasota venue that,the night after hosting a sold-out show by a rising country music star, will hold a concert celebrating another genre — hip-hop, and in particular, classic hip-hop, with the members of two famed '80s New York City rap groups among those performing.

item.title: Winners in $1 billion Powerball drawings to spend money…
item.description: What would you doif you won the lottery?

item.title: Florida bill on mass shooters' drug tests has…
item.description: A Florida Democrat has fileda billbacked by the Church of Scientology in response to a spate of mass shootings in Florida and across the country.

item.title: Weird weather tales: How gators deal with extreme heat…
item.description: When it comes to animals,alligators are likely among the toughestin the world — and they’ve got the reputation to prove it.

item.title: Claire's new owner keeping up to 950 stores open. What…
item.description: You may be able to continue buying inexpensive trendy accessories and getting free ear piercings after all.

item.title: How long did it take North Port to approve the 2025-26 fiscal year budget?
item.description: NORTH PORT – The North Port City Commission needed just over 30 minutesto approve the $331.3 million budget for the 2025-26 fiscal year, and keep the property tax rate unchanged for the sixth consecutive year.

item.title: 3 Sarasota School Board members deserve Hall of Shame for code voteRoger Brown
Beloved Sarasota restaurant and store sets opening date at new space
item.description: While it has been a challenging year for legendary Sarasota shopping and dining destination St. Armands Circle — with longtime restaurants and stores still closed after last year’s hurricanes —one iconic business is making a major comeback.

item.title: Sarasota, Manatee high school football scores: Live FHSAA, SSAA updates from Week 5
item.description: We're at the midpoint of the high school football season as we get to Week 5 of the FHSAA high school football schedule, and some SSAA teams are getting ready to play their sixth game.
